text: وَنُمَكِّنَ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَنُرِيَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا مِنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَحۡذَرُونَ

translation.en: And establish them in the land and show Pharaoh and [his minister] Haman and their soldiers through them that which they had feared
translation.id: dan Kami teguhkan kedudukan mereka di bumi dan Kami perlihatkan kepada Fir'aun dan Haman bersama bala tentaranya apa yang selalu mereka takutkan dari mereka
